articles.title: Vice-Chairman of NDC of DPRK Appointed
articles.content:
Vice-Chairman of NDC of DPRK Appointed
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- A decision of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea in the name of Kim Jong Il, chairman of the NDC and chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, was released on Feb. 19. 
					 According to it, O Kuk Ryol was appointed as vice-chairman of the NDC (General of the Korean People's Army).

articles.title: Greetings to Zimbabwean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Zimbabwean President
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Feb. 18 sent a message of greetings to Robert G. Mugabe, President of Zimbabwe, on the occasion of his 85th birthday.
					 Kim in the message wished the president good health and success in his work for the stability of Zimbabwe and its people's well-being.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Nepalese PM
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Nepalese PM
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Nepalese Prime Minister Pushpa Kamal Dahal sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Katmandu on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary
					Kim Jong Il.
					 Written on the ribbon of the floral basket were letters reading "I wholeheartedly wish the great leader HE Comrade Kim Jong Il good health. Pushpa Kamal Dahal, prime minister of the Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal."
					
					 Authorized by the prime minister, Krishna Bahadur Mahara, minister of Information and Communications of Nepal, visited the DPRK embassy on Feb. 16 to lay the floral basket before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il there.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with gifts on the occasion of his birthday. Among those presented the gifts were the National Youth Organization of Libya, the Nepalese minister of Information and Communications, the Minister of Agriculture and Irrigation of Myanmar and the chief of the German Group for the Study of Songun Politics.
					 The gifts were conveyed to the DPRK ambassadors and officials of the embassies in the relevant countries between Feb. 3 and 13.

articles.title: Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition Draws Many Foreign Visitors and Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition Draws Many Foreign Visitors and Overseas Koreans
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition is drawing not only many Koreans at home but lots of foreigners and overseas compatriots every day on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed there are various kinds of books, photos and art works dealing with the immortal exploits performed by the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and the appearance of the country and its the people, their dignity and honor are shining under the wise leadership of the peerless great men.
					
					The exhibition has been visited by at least 32,000 foreigners and overseas compatriots representing over 3,870 organizations since it was opened to visitors on September 7, Juche 87(1998) on the occasion of the golden jubilee of the DPRK.

articles.title: Spring Water Supply Centers in City
articles.content:
Spring Water Supply Centers in City
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Spring water supply centers have come into being in Wonsan, a port city of the DPRK some time ago.
					 The city has buried water-pipes from a spring water factory located in remote mountains to the heart of city and built five supply centers there.
					
					 The spring water comes naturally to the surface from deep underground in a place tens of kilometers from the city. It flows into the centers regularly.
					
					 As a result, the citizens are provided with quality water better than the water they had used.
					
					 It is efficacious for the treatment of various diseases, to say nothing of water taste.
					
					 A stream of people visits the centers every day.

articles.title: Palhae's Influence on Economy and Culture of Japan
articles.content:
Palhae's Influence on Economy and Culture of Japan
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Palhae was a powerful country in the East which had a significant influence on the development of the economy and culture of Japan.
					 It was founded in 698 after Koguryo and existed for over 200 years.
					
					 It took over the advanced economy and culture of Koguryo and developed them further still.
					
					 The people of Palhae achieved highly developed productive forces by their creative labor and displayed their resourcefulness, wisdom and talent in all fields such as science, literature and art to be widely known to surrounding countries.
					
					 It carried on extensive trade with Japan, starting with the dispatch of its first delegation there in 727.
					
					 In 746 more than 1,100 people of Palhae crossed to Japan to be engaged in   trade of large scale. Through them Palhae exported clothes including bear and sable leather garments, medicinal materials such as insam, honey and musk, toys and so on.
					
					 Through such broad trade its people showed the high economic standard of Palhae and awakened the backward Japanese economy.
					
					 Palhae had also a notable cultural influence on Japan. A number of Japanese anthologies and collections of works of individuals handed down till today tell about the high literary talent of envoys of Palhae and are unsparing of praises on them.
					
					"Sonmyong Calendar", an astronomical calendar which was taken to Japan in 859 by O Hyo Sin, an envoy of Palhae, was used there for nearly 823 years from June 16, 861 to March 3, 1684.
					
					 According to a historical record of Japan, a performance was given by Palhae artistes before more than 5,000 Japanese audience in December 749 to be enthusiastically acclaimed. The Japanese king and nobles were struck with such admiration that they dispatched Japanese musicians to Palhae for learning.
					
					 Palhae had a great influence on other cultural fields of Japan including handicraft and religion.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Sinister Intention Disclosed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Sinister Intention Disclosed
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- When an international mission to prevent frequent piracy in the sea off Somalia was called for at the end of last year, Japan shouted for joy before any other countries and expressed its will to actively participate in anti-piracy operations. Japanese Defense Minister Hamada, when interviewed by media at the end of a recent Cabinet meeting, blustered that the dispatch of warships to the sea was not enough and those warships should be given the right to the unlimited use of weapons.
					 Minju Joson Friday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: 
					
					 It was the real intention of Japan to realize the dispatch of the "Self-Defense Forces (SDF)" overseas under the pretext of helping settle international issues. 
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Japan is more interested in granting the ships of the "SDF" the right to conduct military operations as they please in different parts of the world than taking part in the anti-piracy operations. It is as clear as a pikestaff that Japan will adopt a law on special measures against piracy aimed at allowing the SDF to use not only small arms but heavy weapons in the future. 
					
					 Japan's desperate efforts to achieve its sinister aim in contravention of even domestic law provoke only jeers among people. 
					
					 Japan would be well advised to give up its bad habit of behaving recklessly, poking its nose into this or that affair, while failing to honor its commitments. 
					
					 The first thing to be done by Japan is to redress all the hideous crimes committed by it in the past, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Intention to Escalate Confrontation Flayed
articles.content:
Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Intention to Escalate Confrontation Flayed
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, traitor Lee Myung Bak took an action to replace members of what he called the "advisory council for unification" with ultra-right conservatives, his confidants. Meanwhile, at the prodding of the traitor, the chief vice-chairman of the "advisory council for democracy, peace and unification" and other riff-raffs toured different parts of south Korea to let loose provocative remarks that the deteriorated inter-Korean relations are a product of what they called "tactics for engaging the U.S. and blocking south Korea" and they are attributable to someone's "internal situation." 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 Lee's intention to carry out a wholesale reshuffle of the "advisory council for unification" is a revelation of his sinister aim to maintain his "policy towards the north" rebuffed and condemned at home and abroad by all means and realize his criminal scenario at any cost. 
					
					 Lee's reorganization of the above-said council with ultra-right conservatives is an unpardonable mockery and challenge to all Koreans aspiring after the improved inter-Korean relations, independent reunification, peace and prosperity. 
					
					 The action taken by Lee clearly indicates that he is set to further escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen in reliance upon this anti-reunification organization, far from putting the deteriorated inter-Korean relations on track. 
					
					 The ulterior aim sought by him through the above-said action is to cover up the crimes he has committed by bedeviling the inter-Korean relations that had favorably developed and calm down the people's anger by setting the confrontational maniacs in motion and, at the same time, give further momentum to his anti-DPRK confrontational racket in a bid to realize his ambition to do harm to it come what may. 
					
					 The Lee group should bear in mind that its moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK would only trigger off bitterer resistance and resentment at it among the people from all walks of life in south Korea. 
					
					 The Koreans will not remain a passive onlooker to those moves of the Lee group of traitors but surely bring down a sledgehammer on their heads.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Proud History of DPRK Guided by Juche Idea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Proud History of DPRK Guided by Juche Idea
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The DPRK significantly greeted the 35th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's proclamation of the programme on modeling the whole society on the Juche idea.
					Rodong Sinmun Friday carries an editorial in this regard, which says:
					
					It is the distinguished and historic feat of Kim Jong Il that he laid an eternal foundation for carrying forward to completion the revolutionary cause by proclaiming the programme on modeling the whole society on the Juche idea after foreseeing the prospect of the Korean revolution with his clairvoyant foresight and ideological and theoretical wisdom.
					
					 The last 35 years in which the DPRK has advanced under the banner of imbuing the whole society with the Juche idea are the proud history in which the whole army and all the people have grown to be men of ideology and faith and revolutionaries of Juche type.
					
					 The history of 35 years is also the glorious course in which the single-minded unity between the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolutionary ranks has been cemented as firm as rock on the basis of one idea and one center. And it is the proud course shining with great victory and achievements made in accomplishing the cause of socialism and building a rich and powerful nation.
					
					 Thanks to the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Il, the line of giving importance to ideology has been thoroughly embodied in the party work and activities and it has become the definite tendency of the whole society to learn from the People's Army's idea and spirit.
					
					 It is the noble mental world of the army and the people of the DPRK to live and work as required by the great Juche idea, the Songun idea, regarding it as their lifeline.
					
					 In the course of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea, our army and people have been closely united as an integrated whole sharing the idea, will and destiny with Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The whole party, the entire army and all the people act as one under his monolithic leadership and are replete with the iron faith and will to believe in and follow only Kim Jong Il to the last. This is the true picture of the DPRK's single-minded unity.
					
					 The land of the country has been wonderfully renewed as befitting land of socialist Korea, many modern industrial establishments, production bases and monumental edifices have been built and socialist fairylands have taken their shapes across the country. The history of Korea has never recorded such era as the present Songun era in which the DPRK's strength has grown beyond measure and the dignity of the nation has been demonstrated to the full.
					
					 All the victories achieved in the protracted course of the Korean revolution are mainly attributable to the greatness of the Juche idea, the Songun idea.
					
					 No force on the earth can block the vigorous advance of the army and the people of the DPRK dashing toward the high eminence of a great prosperous and powerful nation under the uplifted banner of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea and the banner of Songun.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Give Priority to Nation
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Give Priority to Nation
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- It is an important way of steadily and dynamically advancing the cause of national reunification for all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to struggle from the firm viewpoint of giving priority to the nation and defending it in response to the call of the joint New Year editorial.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article.
					
					 The viewpoint of giving priority to the nation and defending it is an essential stand to be maintained by the Koreans to foil foreign forces' aggression and interference and anti-reunification moves and accomplish the cause of independent reunification, the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					 The viewpoint of giving priority to the nation and protecting its interests represents a patriotic viewpoint of the nation which calls for giving importance to the nation, not foreign forces, and struggling to protect its interests, not outsiders'.
					
					 If the Koreans struggle, firmly maintaining the above-said viewpoint, they can surely meet all challenges of the separatist forces at home and abroad and realize their cherished desire for national reunification no matter how desperately they may work. 
					
					 It is required by the era of independent reunification for all Koreans to struggle from the above-said viewpoint.
					
					 Whoever desires national reunification should place his nation above the foreign forces and consider his nation's interests more important than foreign forces'. 
					
					 The Koreans should think and act on the basis of justice from the national stand, the patriotic stand, irrespective of ideology, ism and system, and keep to the road of carving out the nation's destiny by its concerted efforts, rejecting foreign aggressor forces.
					
					 The June 15 era of reunification, in which the spirit of giving priority to the nation and defending it prevails and the desire for independent reunification is growing stronger, will make dynamic advance, meeting the challenges of the separatist forces.

articles.title: Struggle for Peace of Korean Peninsula Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle for Peace of Korean Peninsula Declared in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea, including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Confederation of Trade Unions and the Solidarity for Progress, held a rally in Seoul on Feb. 14, declaring the struggle for conclusion of an agreement for peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					 The organizations, through a written resolution, stated that they would wage a vigorous struggle to drive the U.S. forces out of south Korea and replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace accord.
					
					 The process for realizing peace on the Korean Peninsula has been confronted with difficulties by the emergence of the Lee Myung Bak regime, they noted, stressing the need to form an all-people body grouping all civic and public organizations of different regions and sectors across south Korea and escalate the "movement for realizing a peace agreement."
					
					 They declared that they would struggle, in solidarity with overseas compatriots' organizations, to realize the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and get the U.S. forces withdrawn from south Korea.

articles.title: All-People's Campaign to Judge Lee Myung Bak Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
All-People's Campaign to Judge Lee Myung Bak Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean civic and public organizations including the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration held a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 16 at which it declared the period of an all-people campaign to judge traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					 A press release read out at the press conference accused the present "government" of taking such a shameless attitude as refusing to make any apology or repentance of the tragedy in Ryongsan, stressing that only the people's stern punishment awaits the Lee regime.
					
					 Speakers at the press conference denounced the present "government" for driving the inter-Korean relations to confrontation, violating all the agreements adopted between the south and the north.
					
					 They also branded the "government" as a man-killing regime as it murdered people and cracked down upon the movement for democracy and reunification.
					
					 They noted that the period from Feb. 16 to 22 would be set as the period of an all-people campaign to judge the treacherous regime and the civic and public organizations would stage actions in Seoul and Pusan and all other areas of south Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The Brandenburg State Committee of the Communist Party of Germany brought out in pamphlet General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Having a Correct Viewpoint and Understanding of the Juche Philosophy" on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The work, published on Oct. 25, Juche 79 (1990), clearly expounds the problems arising in having a proper understanding of the originality and superiority of the Juche philosophy over the preceding philosophies, the intrinsic attributes of man as a social being and the three major transformation projects--nature-remaking, remolding of man and transformation of society.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Various Countries
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- A meeting and a photo exhibition were held in Mexico and meetings in Switzerland and Mongolia between Feb. 5 and 7 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 On display at the venues of the events were works of the peerlessly great men and photos showing their undying revolutionary exploits and other photos introducing the successes achieved by the Korean people under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, said that Kim Jong Il has wisely led the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people, successfully carrying forward the revolutionary idea and undying exploits of President
						 Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea.
					
					 The revolutionary parties and peoples of the world have been encouraged by the struggle of the WPK and the Korean people advancing under the banner of socialism, he added.
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, highly praised the tremendous vitality of the Songun politics, saying that Kim Jong Il has developed in depth the Songun idea founded by Kim Il Sung to lead the party and state with the Songun politics.
					
					 He expressed the will to invigorate the solidarity movement supporting the Korean people in their just struggle to successfully carry out the tasks set forth in the joint New Year editorial and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the Darkhan-Uul Provincial Committee of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party expressed the will to contribute to the development of the DPRK-Mongolia friendly relations.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings held in Switzerland and Mongolia.

articles.title: O Kuk Ryol nombrado como vicepresidente del CDN
articles.content:
O Kuk Ryol nombrado como vicepresidente del CDN
Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ATCC) -- Segun la resolucion del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y de la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea publicada el dia 19 a nombre del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Presidente de ambos organos, O Kuk Ryol fue nombrado como vicepresidente (general de ejercito del EPC) del CDN de la RPDC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presentes de extranjeros
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presentes de extranjeros
Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presentes que con motivo de su dia de natalicio (16 de febrero), le dirigieran la Organizacion Nacional de los Jovenes de Libia, la Asociacion Internacional del Dialogo Coryo de Rumania, la Oficina para la Promocion y Cooperacion Economicas entre las Companias de Rumania y la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el ministro de Informacion y Comunicaciones de Nepal, el ministro de Agricultura e Irrigacion de Myanmar, el ministro de Carcel del gobierno provincial de Sind de Pakistan y el jefe del Grupo de Estudio de la Politica de Songun (priorizacion militar) de Alemania.
					  Los regalos fueron entregados del dia 3 al 13 a los embajadores y funcionarios de las embajadas coreanas en los respectivos paises.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena el intento de enfrentamiento de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena el intento de enfrentamiento de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el traidor Lee Myung Bak sustituyo a los miembros del "Consejo de Asesores de la Reunificacion", entidad de consulta, por sus lacayos conservadores ultraderechistas.
					 Por otra parte, bajo la instigacion del traidor Lee, el vicepresidente en jefe de la "Sociedad Consultiva de la Democracia, la Paz y la Reunificacion" y otros tipejos deambulan por todo el territorio surcoreano difundiendo sofismas provocativos de que el actual empeoramiento de las relaciones Norte-Sur es el producto de la supuesta "tactica de abrir las puertas a Estados Unidos y cerrarlas al Sur de Corea" y se debe a la "situacion interna" de alguien.
					
					 Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun divulgo este viernes un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					  La sustitucion del personal del "Consejo de Asesores de la Reunificacion" parte del siniestro intento del traidor Lee de mantener a toda costa su "politica hacia el Norte" rechazada en el interior y el exterior del pais y alcanzar sus metas criminales.
					
					  Al convertir esa entidad en un antro de elementos conservadores ultraderechistas, el traidor Lee se burla y desafia frontalmente a toda la nacion coreana que desea el mejoramiento de las relaciones Norte-Sur, la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad.
					
					  Ademas, dejo en claro su voluntad de intensificar la campana de enfrentamiento fratricida apoyandose ese aparato anti-reunificacion, lejos de reparar las empeoradas relaciones con el Norte.
					
					  El esta calculando que si moviliza a todos los maniacos de confrontacion, podra encubrir el crimen de sus compinches de haber llevado al fracaso las relaciones Norte-Sur, que se desarrollaban positivamente, calmar a la encolerizada opinion publica y alcanzar a toda costa su siniestra meta de atropellar a la RPDC al cabo de intensificar las acciones conflictivas con ella.
					
					  La banda de Lee debe saber bien que seran mas fuertes la protesta y la denuncia de los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes sectores cada vez que fueran intensificadas las acciones conflictivas con la RPDC.
					
					  La nacion coreana no estara con brazos cruzados ante tales maniobras demenciales de la horda de los traidores liderados por Lee Myung Bak y la castigara duro sin falta.
